an5.224:1.1: “Mendicants, there are these five drawbacks of overstaying.
an5.224:1.3: You become stingy with dwellings, families, material possessions, praise, and the teaching.
an5.224:1.4: These are the five drawbacks of overstaying.
an5.224:2.1: There are these five benefits of staying for a reasonable length of time.
an5.224:2.3: You’re not stingy with dwellings, families, material possessions, praise, and the teaching.
an5.224:2.4: These are the five benefits of staying for a reasonable length of time.”
